function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regular monitoring of uvgi fixtures’ efficacy and uniform distribution of uvgi.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of alternate methods of disinfection for particles that do not reach the upper-room uv zone.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of uv light bulbs and lamps to ensure sufficient uv light intensity","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proper calibration of ventilation rate and ventilation system to ensure adequate exposure to uv-c irradiation","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing protective measures such as shields and barriers to prevent direct exposure to uv light.","category":"Use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular assessment and maintenance of uvgi fixtures to ensure effectiveness, and consideration of alternative disinfection methods where needed.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Optimizing room airflow and ventilation systems to ensure uniform exposure to uvgi and minimize dead zones.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use combination design of uvgi systems with high-efficiency filtration for more effective removal of biological agents.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct regular studies on virus susceptibility to uvgi to ensure effectiveness, and utilize supplemental control measures in addition to uvgi.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement measures to control and maintain rh levels to ensure the effectiveness of uvgi, and utilize supplemental control measures in addition to uvgi.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Installation of efficient ventilation systems","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enhanced training on disease transmission and infection control measures","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of uvgi systems in air and on surfaces","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Maintaining optimal rh levels in indoor environments","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular hand hygiene and surface disinfection","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proper disposal of biological waste and use of personal protective
